revised_title: Discovery of Jargonium: A New Elementary Substance Associated with Zirconium
tldr: The author, H. C. Sorby, discovered a new elementary substance called Jargonium, associated with Zirconium. Jargonium exhibits unique properties and can exist in three different crystalline states, each producing distinct spectra. The author also discusses the separation of Jargonium from Zirconia and its potential applications in understanding the formation of rocks.
